ticket.title: calculations for stddev will always return a float value
ticket.original-body:
In 99% of all standard deviation calculations you want the return value to be a float value, until now it depends on the value of the column you calculate the Standard deviation for. The standard deviation of a integer field will be an integer as well.
I changed it so it will always be a float, also for stddev_pop and stddev_samp
I also added it to the documentation
